summary: Rellicus Mjanssen is a necromancer follower.
descriptionHtml:
[size=4][b][i][size=3]** Please do not upload this follower to any other site. **[/size][/i][/b]

Rellicus Mjanssen is half Imperial and half Nord practicing the necromantic arts. He is currently keeping a low profile in Iverstead, drinking at the Vilemyre Inn.

He specializes in necromancy and ice spells, one handed fighting and light armor, and has a touch of sneak to help him stay under the local radar.

He is pure vanilla, with no modded features.

He is protected, marriageable, and the only equipment he carries is his trusty ebony sword.
[/size]
author: Dez Cordero
